name: Eye-Strain
description:
This game will cause your eyes to strain, your hands to hurt and your mind to explode in rage!

CONTROLS

Change color of cube:

- XBOX-controller: "A"

- Keyboard: "Space"

Pause-menu:

- XBOX-controller: "B"

- Keyboard: "Esc"

It is highly recommended to play with a XBOX-controller.

UPDATE:

Added a new barrier!

Added a missile with pickup - still testing it!

Updated to a more tight control-system - in progress!
